general_advisory: According to the weather forecast, light to moderate rain is expected with generally cloudy sky. Temperature ranges from 31.0째C to 35.0째C for maximum and 24.0째C to 25.0째C for minimum. Relative humidity varies from 90% to 95% in the morning and 67% to 76% in the afternoon.

advisory: To manage fall armyworm pest, use biopesticide Beauveria bassiana or chemical sprays like Emamectin Benzoate, Spinetoram, or Chlorantraniliprole
To manage Blast disease, use Hexaconazole, Azoxystrobin + Difenoconazole, or Tebuconazole + Trifloxystrobin
To manage Pink stem borer, use Trichogramma chilonis card, Bacillus thuringiensis, or Metarhizium anisopilae
To manage Aphids and Jassids, use neem-based pesticide or chemicals like Flonicamid, Thiamethoxam, or Dinotefuran
To manage Mealy bug infestation, use neem-based pesticide Azadiractin or Profenophos
To manage Shoot and fruit borer, remove affected terminals and fruits, use pheromone traps, and alternate chemical sprays like Emamectin Benzoate, Chlorantraniliprole, or Spinetoram
Provide concentrate to dairy animals due to high moisture content in grasses during rainy days
Feed groundnut oil cake and rice bran, add vitamin and mineral mixture, regularly check pH and water temperature, apply lime and cow dung for pond purification
Prevent bird flu by maintaining cleanliness, changing feed and water frequently, and proper disposal of affected birds
